bibl.title: The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions.
bibl.note: 13 contributions. The majority of the papers were first presented at a colloquium in Cambridge in May 2002. - Pp. 1-4: Introduction; - 320-341: Bibliography; - 342-349: Indices.
bibl.seg: HUNTER Richard (Ed.), The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2005, 8°, x-349 pp. ISBN 0-521-83684-0. £50.
13 contributions. The majority of the papers were first presented at a colloquium in Cambridge in May 2002. - Pp. 1-4: Introduction; - 320-341: Bibliography; - 342-349: Indices.

C.R. par Kris Fletcher, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2006/2006-10-03.html >. - Peter Gainsford, JHS 126 (2006) pp. 151-153 [concerne aussi: Martina HIRSCHBERGER, Gynaikon Katalogos und Megalai Ehoiai. Ein Kommentar zu den Fragmenten zweier hesiodeischer Epen (München - Leipzig, 2004)]. - Martin L. West, CR N.S., 56 (2006) pp. 275-276. - Christophe Cusset, REA 109 (2007) pp. 775-777. - Daniel Donnet, AntCl 76 (2007) pp. 242-243. - Paul Dräger, AnzAW 60 (2007) coll. 4-8. - Ariane Guieu, RPhil 3e s., 80 (2006 [2008]) pp. 167-169. - Jonathan Burgess, Phoenix 62 (2008) pp. 379-381. - Rebecca Lämmle, MusHelv 64 (2007) p. 228.
